urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
As part of our ongoing regulation of the @RedIndustries2 #WalleysQuarry landfill site in #Silverdale #NewcastleUnderLyme we have carried out an audit and issued the company with a Compliance Assessment Report.

Read more 👉 https://t.co/o558iAVicn https://t.co/gyKH2icf6z

🚨 @EnvAgencyMids say a ‘significant breach’ has taken place at Walleys Quarry landfill👇 and that it was ‘not acceptable’. It’s time the EA ordered it to be close down and capped off. Enough is enough. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Gu9Ziz12vU
@Christamafine @EnvAgency Hi @Christamafine . Do you have any pictures of this for us? Thanks, Beth

We're hard at work creating faggot bundles to complement our leaky woody dams. Installing them will help slow the flow further and also trap fine sediment which can impact our watercourses #NFM #MedwayNFM https://t.co/IG2PoBghaA

New record by uttar pradesh (u.p)
Top most polluted cities 
#UttarPradesh #pollution #YogiAdityanath https://t.co/bNFNjwlkb1

tweets.text:
Attention #Anglers🚨

The close season for coarse fishing gets underway on Monday.

This means no coarse fishing on rivers and streams for three months. We do this to give fish a chance to breed🐟

If you see someone breaking this please report it to 0800 807060⚠️ #Fishing https://t.co/sDNnPigRZw

tweets.text: @SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe This should not even be a discussion now. We are being severely impacted now. Woke up last night at 2am and could not sleep. Over a mile away and it is beyond ridiculous levels of odour. Is this a police matter now? Being forced out of our homes. @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA
@HennessyArch @LDN_environment @LondonAssembly @DefraGovUK @EnvAgency @lb_southwark @BurgessPk @WildLondon @GreenLondonAMs @LdnConservative @swklibdems @SouthwarkGP @FoTHCP https://t.co/y9mtJlrEbD

Another BREACH!! Enough is enough why should we suffer because this company @RedIndustries2 is not capable! @EnvAgencyMids It is time you instructed @RedIndustries2 to begin capping the Whole of this site. WE HAVE HAD ENOUGH!! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/0oH8myGHCL

Walleys Landfill stinks to high heaven tonight!On the eve/morning of the emergency @NewsNBC meeting. Do Red Industries even care? They do what they want!  it’s the latest addition to #stinkfest line up - no permit,no health, no future @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/rJV9Q1TVIo

@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Thanks so much. I'll print it out and make a mask when I'm woken by the stench at 2am with crying baby. Top notch work @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA .. cap the n/mind stop the stink... Reform the EA for humans!

@EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 Not good enough. The gases haven’t just appeared. This has been an ongoing breach for YEARS. EA you have failed those you are supposed to protect. I’m going to be lobbying my MP to convene a public inquiry. The lack of action is appalling

@AaronBell4NUL when does this horrific gassing tonight become a public emergency? At this rate I am going to have to run to my car and drive up to the Roaches and sleep there. My throat is burning, my eyes are stinging. Can’t do this anymore. Surely we should be evacuated! https://t.co/Z0jZ35R873

urls.title: Start of the close season: How do we protect our breeding fish at this time of year?
urls.description: Matt Buck, Fisheries Technical Specialist for the Midlands, explains how close season helps protect our breeding fish. Well the evenings are getting lighter, and across the country fish are starting to move out of their winter haunts - a sure …

tweets.text:
The coarse fish #CloseSeason starts today, meaning it’s illegal to fish for coarse fish in rivers until 15 June inclusive.  

We spoke to Fisheries Officer Matt Buck to find out why the close season is so important 👇

More info: https://t.co/u6IhTpkgUB #Angling https://t.co/wVVj0shIow

tweets.text:
⚡ JOIN THE SLOW THE FLOW TEAM ⚡

we are looking appoint three additional, hands-on, volunteer trustees to the Board of Slow The Flow to lead on the following themes:

👉 EDUCATION 
👉 FUNDING
👉 LEGAL 

Could this be you?
 https://t.co/CRJiVLwVr6
@Calderdale @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/p3XnxT3wtf

@StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids That first weekend the stench was that strong along knutton lane it not only took my breath away it made me feel as though I was trapped inside a car with fumes! This isn't normal nor acceptable on any level.

Thank you for inviting me to speak at your inspiring launch event for the @YHClimateCom tonight. Delighted that @OliverHarmarEA is one of the Commissioners and that the @envagency will be a key delivery partner collaborating on this important initiative #yorkshireclimate https://t.co/UWiQ59arwD

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @ClareDinnisEA @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe Omg exactly how bad is this we need details, I don't want to live in Newcastle under Lyme anymore, students should know the risks before they choose to study at Keele University, EA have been informed by residents for years, no excuse for any breach, this is on you @EnvAgencyMids

tweets.text: @CleanUpTadworth @CPRESurrey @WoodlandTrust @SurreyWT @surreyep @KeepBritainTidy @cleanupbritain @EnvAgency @RBBCLeader @Rebecca_SPaul Lost for words.  :-(

The coarse fishing season is closed on rivers and drains until June 16th. Our Fisheries Enforcement Team are out undertaking patrols to ensure no anglers are fishing illegally. @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/qwb6odoBXw

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 This is still not ok!! #stopthestink #capitoff https://t.co/l3ZESFpqNR
